oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oklahoma Roundup Rehearsal - 1946-11-04 - KOMA - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part two of a rehearsal from the Oklahoma Roundup radio program on November 4, 1946 on radio station KOMA (Oklahoma City, Okla). Staff includes Hiram Higsby (master of ceremonies, writer), Allan Page (announcer, director), and Kenyon Brown (producer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Lem Hawkins; Oklahoma Songbirds; Dick Reinhart; Mary Lou
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Hiram Higsby introduces Lem Hawkins / (0:30) Lem Hawkins tells a joke / (2:52) Lem Hawkins performs "[Unidentified banjo tune]" / (4:00) Hiram Higsby introduces the next song / (4:11) Dick Reinhart performs "We’ll Rest At The End Of The Trail" / (6:21) Hiram Higsby and Lem Hawkins tell a joke / (6:53) Lem Hawkins performs "While I Rock All Our Babies To Sleep" [unconfirmed] / (9:13) Hiram Higsby tells a joke / (10:20) The Oklahoma Songbirds perform "I Wonder Where You Are Tonight" / (12:05) Hiram Higsby introduces the next song / (12:13) Dick Reinhart and Mary Lou perform "The Unclouded Day" / (13:40) Hiram Higsby introduces Chuck Davis / (13:47) Closing theme / (14:11) Closing statements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Oklahoma Roundup; CBS Inc.; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.); Higsby, Hiram, 1909-1975; Davis, Chuck; Reinhart, Dick;
